title: Gift taking a long time?
body:
I gifted a friend a skin more than 24 hours ago.  It shows the transaction in the client under the purchases/gifted tab, but I have not gotten a confirmation email that it has been delivered.

What's going on?

replies.body: Ahhhh you may be waiting awhile, because we won't actually send an email receipt for a skin gift being sent. You should see a notification in the upper right-hand corner when your friend opens the gift though!
Thanks for taking the time to comment.
